chapters.title: Chapter 40:  The Tower Shakes
chapters.info: Vora, p. 631—Owner or creator of the white fluted sa'angreal Egwene borrows from the Tower stores to fight the Seanchan. The same sa'angreal was used by Siuan Sanche, then the Amyrlin seat, to separate Mat from the dagger he took from Shadar Logoth. It is the most powerful sa'angreal the Tower has in its stores.
